home.headline: Level Up Your
home.subheadline: Master personal finance through fun, gamified quests. Join 50,000+ users who are already winning with money!

home.no_credit_card: No credit card required â€¢ Free forever plan
home.feature_1_desc: Turn boring finance into exciting quests with points, badges, and levels

home.feature_3_desc: Apply what you learn immediately to improve your financial life

testimonials.content_1: Finally, a finance app that makes learning fun! I've saved $500 in my first month.
testimonials.content_2: The quests helped me understand investing. My portfolio is up 15%!
testimonials.content_3: Perfect for teaching my kids about money. They love the rewards system!

home.testimonial_1: FinanceQuest made learning about money actually fun! I've saved $2,000 in just 3 months.
home.testimonial_2: The gamification keeps me coming back. My credit score improved by 100 points!
home.testimonial_3: Finally, a finance app that doesn't bore me to death. Highly recommend!
